== Madathumpady (CT) (627884) ==

Madathumpady (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.08 sq. km. and harbouring 1098 households with total population of 4294 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 276 km. Male population is 2113 and female population is 2181. Scheduled Caste population is 568 and Scheduled Tribes population is 15. Census Location Code of the town is 627884<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Chalakudy at a distance of 20 km.
